files.patch:
@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 1999, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 1999, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -45,1 +45,1 @@
-	count=`echo $+ | wc -w` ; \
+	@count=`echo $+ | wc -w` ; \
@@ -47,0 +47,21 @@
+ifndef JDK8HOME
+	@echo "Warning: JDK8HOME not set; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
+ifndef JDK9HOME
+	@echo "Warning: JDK9HOME not set; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
+ifndef JDK10HOME
+	@echo "Warning: JDK10HOME not set; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
+ifndef JDK14HOME
+	@echo "Warning: JDK14HOME not set; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
+ifndef JDK18HOME
+	@echo "Warning: JDK18HOME not set; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
+ifdef HEADLESS
+	@echo "Warning: HEADLESS is set; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
+ifeq ($(OS_NAME), windows)
+	@echo "Warning: OS is Windows; some tests may not have been executed"
+endif
@@ -82,0 +103,3 @@
+ifdef JDK10HOME
+	@echo "JDK10HOME           = $(JDK10HOME)"
+endif

@@ -1,42 +0,0 @@
-#
-# Copyright (c) 1997, 2017, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
-# DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
-#
-# This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
-# under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
-# published by the Free Software Foundation.  Oracle designates this
-# particular file as subject to the "Classpath" exception as provided
-# by Oracle in the LICENSE file that accompanied this code.
-#
-# This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
-# ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
-# FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
-# version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
-# accompanied this code).
-#
-# You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
-# 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
-# Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
-#
-# Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
-# or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
-# questions.
-#
-
-#----------------------------------------------------------------------
-
-# 6533043: support failureProperty and errorProperty in <jtreg> task
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/T6533043.ok: $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/javatest.jar \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
-	JAVA_HOME=$(JDKHOME) $(ANT) -f $(TESTDIR)/6533043/build.xml \
-		-Dbuild.jtreg=$(BUILDDIR)/jtreg \
-		-Djtreg.jar=$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-		-Dtestjdk=$(JDK5HOME)
-	echo "test passed at `date`" > $@
-
-ifdef ANT
-ifdef JDK5HOME
-TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/T6533043.ok
-endif
-endif

@@ -1,78 +0,0 @@
-<project name="props-test" default="go" basedir="../../make">
-
-    <property name="build.jtreg" value="../build/jtreg"/>
-    <property name="tests" value="../test/6533043"/>
-
-    <property name="jtreg.jar" value="dist/lib/jtreg.jar"/>
-    <property name="testjdk" value="/tl/jdk/1.6.0"/>
-
-    <target name="go" depends="t-p,t-pf,t-pe,t-pfe"/>
-
-    <target name="t-p" depends="defs">
-        <diagnostics/>
-<echo message="basedir=${basedir}"/>
-<echo message="build.jtreg=${build.jtreg}"/>
-<echo message="tests=${tests}"/>
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            verbose="summary"
-            failureProperty="p-f"
-            errorProperty="p-e"
-            includes="Pass.java"/>
-        <fail if="p-e">p-e should not be set</fail>
-        <fail if="p-f">p-f should not be set</fail>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="t-pf" depends="defs">
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            verbose="summary"
-            failureProperty="pf-f"
-            errorProperty="pf-e"
-            includes="Pass.java, Fail.java"/>
-        <fail if="pf-e">pf-e should not be set</fail>
-        <fail unless="pf-f">pf-f should  be set</fail>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="t-pe" depends="defs">
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            verbose="summary"
-            failureProperty="pe-f"
-            errorProperty="pe-e"
-            includes="Pass.java, Error.java"/>
-        <fail unless="pe-e">pe-e should be set</fail>
-        <fail unless="pe-f">pe-f should be set</fail>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="t-pfe" depends="defs">
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533043/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            verbose="summary"
-            failureProperty="pfe-f"
-            errorProperty="pfe-e"
-            includes="*.java"/>
-        <fail unless="pfe-e">pfe-e should be set</fail>
-        <fail unless="pfe-f">pfe-f should be set</fail>
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="defs">
-        <taskdef name="jtreg"
-            classname="com.sun.javatest.regtest.Main$$Ant"
-            classpath="${jtreg.jar}"
-        />
-    </target>
-
-</project>

-    }

@@ -1,43 +0,0 @@

-# 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
-# Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.

-#----------------------------------------------------------------------
-
-# 6533074: allow additional compiler options to be specified
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/T6533074.ok: $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/javatest.jar \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
-	JAVA_HOME=$(JDKHOME) $(ANT) -f $(TESTDIR)/6533074/build.xml \
-		-Dbuild.jtreg=$(BUILDDIR)/jtreg \
-		-Djtreg.jar=$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-		-Dtestjdk=$(JDK5HOME)
-	echo "test passed at `date`" > $@
-
-ifdef ANT
-ifdef JDK5HOME
-TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/T6533074.ok
-endif
-endif
-

@@ -1,54 +0,0 @@
-<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
-<project name="javac-opts" default="go" basedir="../../make">
-
-    <property name="build.jtreg" value="../build/jtreg"/>
-    <property name="tests" value="../test/6533074"/>
-
-    <property name="jtreg.jar" value="dist/lib/jtreg.jar"/>
-    <property name="testjdk" value="/tl/jdk/1.6.0"/>
-
-
-    <target name="go" depends="defs">
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            includes="*.java"
-            failureProperty="f"
-        />
-        <fail unless="f">test should have failed</fail>
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            javacOptions="-XDfailcomplete=java.lang.String"
-            includes="*.java"
-        />
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            includes="*.java">
-            <arg line="-javacOption:-XDfailcomplete=java.lang.String"/>
-        </jtreg>
-        <jtreg
-            jdk="${testjdk}"
-            workDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/work"
-            reportDir="${build.jtreg}/6533074/report"
-            dir="${tests}"
-            includes="*.sh">
-            <arg line="-javacOption:-XDfailcomplete=java.lang.String"/>
-        </jtreg>
-
-    </target>
-
-    <target name="defs">
-        <taskdef name="jtreg"
-                 classname="com.sun.javatest.regtest.Main$$Ant"
-                 classpath="${jtreg.jar}"
-        />
-    </target>
-</project>

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 1997, 2017, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 1997, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -26,0 +26,4 @@
+# These tests use two different older versions of JDK
+# to test jtreg jdk-related options. They need to both
+# be < JDK 9 or >= JDK 9, and both different from JDKHOME
+
@@ -39,1 +43,1 @@
-		-compilejdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
+		-compilejdk:$(JDK9HOME) \
@@ -43,1 +47,1 @@
-	grep $(JDK5HOME) $(@:%.ok=%)/work/CompileTest.jtr
+	grep $(JDK9HOME) $(@:%.ok=%)/work/CompileTest.jtr
@@ -57,1 +61,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDK9HOME) \
@@ -65,1 +69,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDK9HOME) \
@@ -68,1 +72,1 @@
-	grep $(JDK5HOME) $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ExecuteTest.jtr
+	grep $(JDK9HOME) $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ExecuteTest.jtr
@@ -83,1 +87,1 @@
-		-compilejdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
+		-compilejdk:$(JDK9HOME) \
@@ -100,2 +104,2 @@
-		-compilejdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
-		-jdk:$(JDK6HOME) \
+		-compilejdk:$(JDK9HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDK10HOME) \
@@ -114,2 +118,2 @@
-		-compilejdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
-		-jdk:$(JDK6HOME) \
+		-compilejdk:$(JDK9HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDK10HOME) \
@@ -117,2 +121,2 @@
-	fgrep 'COMPILEJAVA=$(JDK5HOME)' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ShellTest.jtr
-	fgrep 'TESTJAVA=$(JDK6HOME)' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ShellTest.jtr
+	fgrep 'COMPILEJAVA=$(JDK9HOME)' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ShellTest.jtr
+	fgrep 'TESTJAVA=$(JDK10HOME)' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ShellTest.jtr
@@ -136,1 +140,1 @@
-	echo '$(JDK6HOME)/bin/java $$*' > $@
+	echo '$(JDK10HOME)/bin/java $$*' > $@
@@ -140,1 +144,2 @@
-ifdef JDK5HOME
+ifdef JDK9HOME
+ifdef JDK10HOME
@@ -153,0 +158,1 @@
+endif

@@ -1,42 +0,0 @@
-/*
- * Copyright (c) 2010, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
- * DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
- *
- * This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
- * under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
- * published by the Free Software Foundation.
- *
- * This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
- * ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
- * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
- * version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
- * accompanied this code).
- *
- * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
- * 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
- * Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
- *
- * Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
- * or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
- * questions.
- */
-
-/*
- * @test
- */
-
-// basic test for verifying jtreg can handle JDK 1.1 tests (since jtreg
-// has different code for handling JDK 1.1)
-
-public class ExecuteTest {
-    public static void main(String[] args) {
-        String[] props = {
-            "java.class.path",
-            "java.specification.version"
-        };
-
-        for (int i = 0; i < props.length; i++) {
-            System.err.println(props[i] + " = " + System.getProperty(props[i]));
-        }
-    }
-}

@@ -1,63 +0,0 @@
-#
-# Copyright (c) 1997, 2015, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
-# DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
-#
-# This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
-# under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
-# published by the Free Software Foundation.  Oracle designates this
-# particular file as subject to the "Classpath" exception as provided
-# by Oracle in the LICENSE file that accompanied this code.
-#
-# This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
-# ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
-# FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
-# version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
-# accompanied this code).
-#
-# You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
-# 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
-# Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
-#
-# Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
-# or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
-# questions.
-#
-
-#----------------------------------------------------------------------
-
-# Test compilation and execution using JDK 1.1
-# Only othervm supported -- jtreg can't run agentvm on 1.1
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/JDK11Test.1.ok: \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
-	$(RM) $(@:%.ok=%)
-	JTREG_SHOWAGENT=true JTREG_SHOWCMD=true \
-	JT_JAVA=$(JDK6HOME) \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg $(JTREG_OPTS) \
-		-w:$(@:%.ok=%)/work -r:$(@:%.ok=%)/report \
-		-jdk:$(JDK1_1HOME) \
-		$(TESTDIR)/jdk11/ExecuteTest.java
-	echo "test passed at `date`" > $@
-
-# Test split compilation using JDK 1.1
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/JDK11Test.2.ok: \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
-	$(RM) $(@:%.ok=%)
-	JTREG_SHOWAGENT=true JTREG_SHOWCMD=true \
-	JT_JAVA=$(JDK6HOME) \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg $(JTREG_OPTS) \
-		-w:$(@:%.ok=%)/work -r:$(@:%.ok=%)/report \
-		-compilejdk:$(JDK1_1HOME) \
-		-jdk:$(JDK6HOME) \
-		$(TESTDIR)/jdk11/ExecuteTest.java
-	echo "test passed at `date`" > $@
-
-ifdef JDK1_1HOME
-ifdef JDK6HOME
-TESTS.jtreg += \
-	$(BUILDTESTDIR)/JDK11Test.1.ok \
-	$(BUILDTESTDIR)/JDK11Test.2.ok
-endif
-endif
-

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 2014, 2017, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 2014, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -77,1 +77,1 @@
-		-nativepath:"$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg$(PS)$(JDK6HOME)" \
+		-nativepath:"$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg$(PS)$(JDKHOME)" \

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 1997, 2017, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 1997, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -29,1 +29,1 @@
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/javacExitCodes.jdk5.othervm.ok: \
+$(BUILDTESTDIR)/javacExitCodes.othervm.ok: \
@@ -36,16 +36,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK5HOME) \
-		-othervm \
-		$(TESTDIR)/testJavacExitCodes/  \
-			> $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log) 2>&1 || \
-	    true "non-zero exit code from JavaTest intentionally ignored"
-	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 4; failed: 4' $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log)  > /dev/null
-	echo "test passed at `date`" > $@
-
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/javacExitCodes.jdk6.othervm.ok: \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
-	$(RM) $(@:%.ok=%) ; $(MKDIR) $(@:%.ok=%)
-	JT_JAVA=$(JDKJAVA) \
-	    $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg $(JTREG_OPTS) \
-		-w:$(@:%.ok=%)/work -r:$(@:%.ok=%)/report \
-		-jdk:$(JDK6HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDKHOME) \
@@ -59,7 +44,1 @@
-ifdef JDK5HOME
-TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/javacExitCodes.jdk5.othervm.ok
-endif
-
-ifdef JDK6HOME
-TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/javacExitCodes.jdk6.othervm.ok
-endif
+TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/javacExitCodes.othervm.ok

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 1997, 2017, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 1997, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -32,1 +32,1 @@
-		TEST_OUTPUT_DIR=`pwd`/$(BUILDTESTDIR)/$(@:%.ok=%) \
+		TEST_OUTPUT_DIR=$(BUILDTESTDIR)/$(@:%.ok=%) \
@@ -74,1 +74,1 @@
-		-jdk:$(JDK6HOME) \
+		-jdk:$(JDKHOME) \

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 2018, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 2018, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -37,2 +37,2 @@
-		-compileJDK:$(JDK8HOME) \
-		-testJDK:$(JDK8HOME) \
+		-compileJDK:$(JDK10HOME) \
+		-testJDK:$(JDK10HOME) \
@@ -47,1 +47,1 @@
-ifdef JDK8HOME
+ifdef JDK10HOME
@@ -63,2 +63,2 @@
-		-compileJDK:$(JDK7HOME) \
-		-testJDK:$(JDK8HOME) \
+		-compileJDK:$(JDK9HOME) \
+		-testJDK:$(JDK10HOME) \
@@ -75,2 +75,2 @@
-ifdef JDK7HOME
-ifdef JDK8HOME
+ifdef JDK9HOME
+ifdef JDK10HOME
